Title: Relates to prohibiting mobile sports wagering operators and platforms from allowing more than five deposits from an authorized sports bettor in twenty-four hours
Summary: Prohibits mobile sports wagering operators and mobile sports wagering platforms from allowing more than five deposits from an authorized sports bettor in a twenty-four hour period.
LawSection: Racing, Pari-Mutuel Wagering and Breeding Law
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the racing, pari-mutuel wagering and breeding law, in relation to prohibiting mobile sports wagering operators and platforms from allowing more than five deposits from an authorized sports bettor in twenty-four hours
